title: why my search_agent don't get any iterations?
body:
I use the offical input file as recommandation. Here's my output.

{"query": "when was puerto rico added to the usa", "episode": "q0: "when was puerto rico added to the usa"
answer: "1950"
final_query: "when was puerto rico added to the usa"
"}
{"query": "names of the metropolitan municipalities in south africa", "episode": "q0: "names of the metropolitan municipalities in south africa"
answer: "Mangaung Metropolitan Municipality\tNelson Mandela Bay Metropolitan Municipality\teThekwini Metropolitan Municipality\tCity of Tshwane Metropolitan Municipality\tCity of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality\tBuffalo City Metropolitan Municipality\tCity of Ekurhuleni Metropolitan Municipality"
final_query: "names of the metropolitan municipalities in south africa"
"}
{"query": "where does it talk about mary magdalene in the bible", "episode": "q0: "where does it talk about mary magdalene in the bible"
answer: "New Testament"
final_query: "where does it talk about mary magdalene in the bible"
"}
{"query": "who is the guy who voiced disney channel", "episode": "q0: "who is the guy who voiced disney channel"
answer: "\"Buzz\" Brainard\tCameron"
final_query: "who is the guy who voiced disney channel"
"}
{"query": "who starred in the movie deep water horizon", "episode": "q0: "who starred in the movie deep water horizon"
answer: "Kurt Russell\tDylan O\'Brien\tJohn Malkovich\tKate Hudson\tGina Rodriguez\tMark Wahlberg"
final_query: "who starred in the movie deep water horizon"
"}
{"query": "who was the first one to migrate to madinah", "episode": "q0: "who was the first one to migrate to madinah"
answer: "Islamic prophet Muhammad"
final_query: "who was the first one to migrate to madinah"
"}
{"query": "what is the size of the angles of an equilateral triangle", "episode": "q0: "what is the size of the angles of an equilateral triangle"
answer: "60\302\260"
final_query: "what is the size of the angles of an equilateral triangle"
"}
{"query": "who wrote the music for somewhere in time", "episode": "q0: "who wrote the music for somewhere in time"
answer: "John Barry"
final_query: "who wrote the music for somewhere in time"
"}
{"query": "where is the new tottenham stadium being built", "episode": "q0: "where is the new tottenham stadium being built"
answer: "the London Borough of Haringey"
final_query: "where is the new tottenham stadium being built"
"}

It seems like nothing happens because I get the same q0 as my original query. So what's wrong with it?
